channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Covers, Gratings & Frames problem, 3rd July
item.description:
28 day with 3 way traffic lights please lift and reset sunken rocking surface water cover in carriageway size approx 1200x1200x40mm stats required (Broken Chamber Cover/Frame)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 3rd July
item.description:
Please pass to relevant ahr covering this area. Sign post on verge is beginning to rust near the base. Does not move significantly when pushed by hand so does notpose an immediate risk of falling. Please arrange for replacement post to be installed on verge.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 3rd July
item.description:
2hr make safe with give and take please place x2 1m barriers plus x2 sandbags around footway pothole next to manhole cover 2000x1000 (FW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signs & cones left behind, 3rd July
item.description:
On the cross road junction 2 cones & 2 signs have been thrown against the verge, left for over a month now - very insightful, unnecessary & not environmentally friendly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 3rd July
item.description:
PLEASE PASS ON TO LOCAL AHR REGARDING REPLACING TRAFFIC LIGHT SIGN AND POST
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Overgrown grass on football pitch, 3rd July
item.description:
Old richians sports ground, football games start 12th July and grass is long especially where railway staff moved goals and left them on pitch without moving them back
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandyleaze, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 2nd July
item.description:
This has been growing since middle June now is a fire risk it's a pathway between 2 council flats

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Dunalley Parade, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree branches too low, 2nd July
item.description:
On the Lansdown Road bridge over the railway line Tree branches are obstructing the cycle/footpath Need trimming to allow cyclists to pass underneath

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88a, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ringway contractors have left two sets of barriers across pavement one of which is hanging over kerb, 2nd July
item.description:
At the top of Montpellier Grove, on the left=hand side, just prior to it's junction with Suffolk Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: The grass in zhurdington was cut 2 weeks ago. But the grass on the yarnolds was not cut. The grass ag the end is now 6foot tall. This is not acceptable., 2nd July
item.description:
End of Yarnolds.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Yarnolds, Shurdington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Big pothole going into the right wide of Broad Oak Way, 2nd July
item.description:
Near the entrance of Broad Oay Way, outside number 74 (road side). Where the road splits to either left or right.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Broad Oak Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Bridleway from Far Stanley up Stanley Hill blocked by fallen tree., 2nd July
item.description:
The tree is over the bridleway. It is passable (although not for horses or cyclists). In my estimation the maximum diameter of the trunks is 15cm. Possibly a job for CVW.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prescott, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
